text: Jesus answered, “It is the one to whom I give this morsel after I have dipped it.” 13:26 Then he dipped the morsel ¦ When he had dipped the morsel, he took it NA WHThen he dipped the morsel and gave it to 13:26 Judas Iscariot, the son of Simon ¦ Judas, the son of Simon Iscariot CTJudas Iscariot, the son of Simon.
